meanings.definition: A rare mineral, a chromium-rich member of the clinochlore subgroup of the chlorite group, with the formula (Mg,Fe)₅Al(Si₃Al)O₁₀(OH)₈.
meanings.english_definition: A rare mineral, a chromium-rich member of the clinochlore subgroup of the chlorite group, with the formula (Mg,Fe)₅Al(Si₃Al)O₁₀(OH)₈.

examples.sentence: The kotschubeite was found in serpentinite rocks.
examples.translation: そのコチュベイトは蛇紋岩の中で発見された。

etymology.value: Named after Russian mineralogist Count Pavel Vasilyevich Kochubey (Kotschubey).
